name: UAC Bypass Using MSConfig Token Modification - Process
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a msconfig GUI hack (UACMe 55)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System) AND process.parent.executable:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\pkgmgr.exe AND process.command_line:\"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\msconfig.exe\"\ \-5)`
